page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE 2
page.content: After playtime it is maths. It is my favourite lesson. My maths teacher is Mr. Field. At 11.45 it is team assembly, and at 12.00 it is lunchtime. I go home for dinner with Farhat. At 12.45 Farhat comes and calls for me, and on the way to school we buy some things to eat. At 1.00 it is Art, and I enjoy doing art as well as maths. At the moment I am doing calligraphy in art. At 2.30 it is breaktime, and I play rounders with my friends. After break we do our Environmental Studies. At 3.30 it is hometime and I walk with Farhat and my other friends. Tea is ready when I get home, and I often have samosas and pakoras. If it is a hot day we sit on the grass and have ice-cream and drinks
